abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Draws a machine card.Each 2 levels of stat IVs lower the Base Attack Power of the drawn machine.Each 2 levels of stat EVs lower the Accuracy.Each 2 levels of stat nature lowers the Power of the drawn machine and has a 20% chance of the drawn machine being unable to be triggered.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.description: After battle, switches between Megenius (increases special attack stat by 1 and lowers normal damage) and Transcendence (increases special attack stat by 4 and increases special defense stats by 4) until Megenius explores opponent once.
